id.description: The unique identifier of the tyre manufacturer.

name.description: The name of the tyre manufacturer.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country of origin of the tyre manufacturer.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the tyre manufacturer in a race.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the tyre manufacturer in a race.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the tyre manufacturer.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the tyre manufacturer.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the tyre manufacturer.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the tyre manufacturer.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the tyre manufacturer.

totalPodiumRaces.description: The total number of races in which the tyre manufacturer finished on the podium.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the tyre manufacturer.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the tyre manufacturer.
